alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:54AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Orange County through 345 AM EDT... At 253 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Smallwood to 6 miles east of Canadensis to Bath. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Jervis, Cuddebackville, Otisville, Huguenot and Deerpark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
